Life on Earth
Blue Planet

attributes.background: His work in Journalism, National History, Conservation & Ecology speak for themselves.  His infectious love & joy for the Natural world has brought nature to generations of people - & he has effectively highlighted the issues that currently plague our planet, such as plastic & general pollution.....

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you'd like to happen when 8 May falls on a weekend or on Early May Bank Holiday.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
